long_description: Maximize the performance of waterproof, breathable outerwear and skiwear with this Nikwax care kit. Nikwax water-based products are nontoxic and contain no harmful solvents, fluorocarbons or propellants. Tech Wash cleans and revitalizes breathability and water repellency. TX.Direct wash-in waterproofing restores the water-repellent finish. Extends life and enhances performance of Gore-Tex(R), eVent(R) fabric, REI Elements(R) and other waterproof, breathable coatings and laminates.
short_description: Maximize the performance of waterproof, breathable outerwear and skiwear with this Nikwax care kit.
